Articles.Content:
Hello, so I need a config for ROEngines where it does not replace engines that was already in game before installing it. I just had my ISS despawn because I did not undock the shuttle before installing ROEngines and ROCapsules. So once I started the game again, the station despawned and the new engines just does not look right on the shuttle. (Solved)

Edited January 10, 2021 by somerandomperson
